charges.charge_description: 18:894 RACKETEERING, EXTORTION CREDIT TRANSACT.-Conspiracy to collect and atempt to collect an extension of credit by extortionate means (2s)

charges.charge_disposition: 18 months imprisonment on count 2 of the superseding indictment. Upon release from custody, the defendant shall be on supervised relase with special conditions. The defendant is to perform 300 hours of community service at such times and under such conditions as U.S. Probation directs; the defendant is to maintain gainful employment. The defendant shall voluntarily surrender on 1/4/95 at 9:00 a.m. in New Haven CT, to the USM for this district, unless otherwise directed. A special assessment of $50.00 is imposed. (2s)

18:894 RACKETEERING, EXTORTION CREDIT TRANSACT.-Conspiracy to collect and atempt to collect an extension of credit by extortionate means (2s)

charges.charge_disposition: 12 months imprisonment on count 2 of the superseding indictment. Upon release from custody, the defendant shall be on supervised release with special conditions: the defendant is to perform 300 hours of community service at such times and under such conditions as U.S. Probation directs, the defendant is to maintain gainful employment. The defendant shall voluntarily surrender on 1/4/95 at 9:00 in New Haven, Ct to the USM for this district, unless otherwise directed. A special assessment of $50.00 is imposed. (2s)
